## (Convex function)
amazing**convex function****concave function**.

OKconvex function

 \\(f(x)\\) \\(a\\)\\(b\\) \\( 0 \leq \theta \leq 1\\)convex function
$$f(\theta a+(1-\theta b)) \leq \theta f(a) + (1- \theta)f(b)$$


![](http://otmy7guvn.bkt.clouddn.com/blog/1/1-1.png) 

**strictly convex function**.

Convex function

### First order condition
 function \\(f\\)****
$$ 	\nabla f=( \frac{\partial f(x)}{x_1}, \frac{\partial f(x)}{x_2},...,  \frac{\partial f(x)}{x_n})$$
 \\(f\\)convex function**** \\(x\\)  \\(y\\)
$$ f(y) \geq f(x) + \nabla f(x)^T (y - x)$$
OK

![](http://otmy7guvn.bkt.clouddn.com/blog/1/1-2.png) 

convex function \\(f\\)

### Second order condition
 function \\(f\\)**** \\(n\\) Hessian matrix
$$ \nabla ^2 f(x) = \frac{ \partial ^2 f(x)}{ \partial x_i \partial x_j}, \quad i,j = 1,2,...,n$$
Hessian matrix positive semi-defnite\\(f\\) convex function****reference

---
 \\(\Bbb R\\) convex function
* \\(f(x) = ax+b\\)
* \\(f(x)=e^ {ax}\\)
*  \\(f(x)=xlogx \quad on \quad \Bbb R_{++}\\)

concave function
* \\(f(x) = ax+b\\)
*  \\(f(x)=logx  \quad on \quad \Bbb R_{++}\\)

convexconcavefirst order condition

convex functionconvex function. machine learningconvex functionoptimizeconvex functionliner regressionlogistic regressionconvex functiongradient descentnewton's method.

## (Gradient descent)
gradient descentliner regressionLiner regressionleast square methodcost function
$$J( \theta)= \frac{1}{2} \sum_{i=1} ^m (h_ \theta (x ^{(i)})-y^{(i)})^2, \quad h_ \theta (x)= \theta ^Tx $$
liner regression\\( J( \theta) \\) **\\( \theta\\)**minimumgradient descentgradient descentreference. 

cost functiongradient descent

\\(J( \theta)\\)convex function\\( \theta\\)least square cost functionconvex function.

least square cost functionconvex functiongradient descentgradient descent

> Gradien descentobjective functionconvex function

object functionnon-convex functionobjective functionconvex functiongradient descent

![](http://otmy7guvn.bkt.clouddn.com/blog/1/1-3.png) 

gradien descentstochastic gradient descentnon-convex optimization

gradient descentminimize liner regressionconvex optimization

## (Newton's method)
Newton's method logistic regressionlog cost function**label-1+1**cost function0,1
$$J( \omega)= - \frac{1}{m} \sum_{i=1} ^{m} log(1+e^{-y^{(i)} \omega^T x^{(i)}})$$
-1+1\\(J( \omega)\\)logistic regressionSVM

likehood function \\(- \frac{1}{m}\\) \\(J( \omega)\\)convex functionconvex function\\(J( \omega)\\)\\( \omega\\)

log cost functionconvexconcaveconvex function

OKlog cost functionconvex functiongradient descentnewton's method

Newton's methodreferencelog cost functionconvex functionsecond order conditionHessian matrixpositive semi-definiteL2 regularizer**L2 regularizerstrict convex function**log cost functionstrict convex function
$$J( \omega)= - \frac{1}{m} \sum_{i=1} ^{m} log(1+e^{-y^{(i)} \omega^T x^{(i)}})+ \frac{1}{2}|| \omega||^2$$
log cost function**Hessian matrixpositive definite**newton's method newton's methodlog cost function

gradient descentnewton's methodgradient descentnewton's methodconvex optimizationconvex optimizationunconstrained optimization
<!--more-->

optimization taskobjective function \\(f(x)\\)
* \\(f(x)\\)\\( \nabla f(x)=0\\)**newton's method**
* \\(f(x)\\)**gradient descent**

OK

## (Taylor series)
Taylor series\\( f(x)\\)\\( x_0\\)\\(n+1\\)\\( f(x)\\)\\(n\\)Taylor series
$$f(x)=f(x_0)+ \nabla f(x_0)(x-x_0) + \frac{ \nabla ^2 f(x_0)}{2!}(x-x_0)^2 +...+\frac{ \nabla ^n f(x_0)}{n!}(x-x_0)^n $$
Taylor series

> In mathematics, a Taylor series is a representation of a function as an infinite sum of terms that are calculated from the values of the function's derivatives at a single point.

Taylor series\\( f(x)\\)\\( x_0\\)\\( x_0\\)derivativesfunctionfunction\\(f(x)\\)Taylor series\\(f(x)\\)0Taylor series\\( f(x)\\)\\( x_0\\)\\(x_0\\)

1st order Taylor seriesgradient descent2nd order Taylor seriesnewton's method

OK

## 1st order Taylor series & gradient descent
\\(x_k\\)kgradient descent\\(x\\)1st order Taylor series 
$$f(x)=f(x_k)+ \nabla f(x_k)(x-x_k)$$
\\(x\\)gradient descent\\(f(x)\\)
$$f(x_k)-f(x)=- \nabla f(x_k)(x-x_k)$$
**\\(- \nabla f(x_k)(x-x_k)\\)**\\((x-x_k)\\)\\(\vec g\\)\\( \alpha\\)
$$ \min \nabla f(x_k)(x-x_k) = \min( \alpha \vec{\nabla f(x_k)} \vec g)$$
****

>

\\(\vec g\\)\\( \vec{\nabla f(x_k)}\\)
$$x-x_k=- \alpha \nabla f(x_k)$$
$$x:=x_k- \alpha \nabla f(x_k)$$
gradient descentyeah mateWe make it!
## 2nd order Taylor series & newton's method
gradient descent\\(x_k\\)\\(k\\)newton's method\\(x\\)2nd order Taylor series 
$$f(x)=f(x_k)+ \nabla f(x_k)(x-x_k) + \frac{1}{2}(x-x_k)^T \nabla^2 f(x_k)(x-x_k) $$
\\(x\\)
$$ \nabla f(x) = \nabla f(x_k) + (x-x_k) \nabla^2 f(x_k)=0$$
newton's method\\(\nabla f(x)=0\\)**\\(x\\)newton's method\\(k+1\\)\\(x\\)**\\(\nabla f(x_k)\\)\\(x_k\\)\\( \nabla^2 f(x_k)\\)\\(x_k\\)Hessian

\\(\nabla f(x_k)=g\\)\\(\nabla^2 f(x_k)=H\\)
$$g+H(x-x_k)=0$$

$$x=x_k-H^{-1}g$$
\\(-g H^{-1} \\) \\(g\\)\\( g^T H^{-1} g > 0\\)positive definite**Hessianpositive definite**

Hessiannegative definite\\(g\\)newton's methodnewton's methodobjective functionnon-convex function\\(k\\)\\(x_k\\)Hessian matrix negative definitenewton's methodBFGS
## Sum up

![](http://otmy7guvn.bkt.clouddn.com/blog/2/2-1.png) 
\\(k\\)\\(x_k\\)objective function\\(x_k\\)Taylor series \\(f(x)\\)gradient descentfunctionnewton's methodfunction

new's method\\( \nabla f(x)=0\\)\\(x_{k+1}\\)\\(x_{k+1}\\)function

Newton's methodfunctionnewton's methodobjective function value(value)value(value)gradient descentfunction valuenewton's methodobjective functionnewton's method

functionconvex functionunconstrained optimizationnon-convex optimizationnon-convex optimizationnewton's methodHessian matrixpositive definite\\(\lambda\\)Hessian matrix negative definite
$$x:=x- \lambda H^{-1} g$$
non-convex functionconvex functionnewton's methodnewton's mtehodnon-convex

gradient descentfunctiongradient descentnon-convex optimizationgradient descent

<!--more-->
## MAP and regularization
cost functionregularization**MLE**(Maximum likelihood estimation)Andrew NgCS229AIregularization**MAP**(Maximum a posteriori estimation)**priori distribution**MLE

priori distributiondistributiondistribution

L1 regularizationpriori distribution**Laplacian distribution**L2 regularizationpriorit distribution**Gaussian distribution**Gaussian distributionLaplacian distribution
$$p(x;a)= \frac{a}{2} e^{-a|x|}$$

![](http://otmy7guvn.bkt.clouddn.com/blog/4/4-1.png) 
distributionregularization
### Lasso regression
liner regression\\( \theta\\)Laplacian distributioncost function
$$J( \theta) = \frac{1}{2} \sum^{m}_{i=1} (y^{(i)}- \theta^T x^{(i)})+ \lambda \sum^{d}_{j=1}| \theta^{(i)}|$$
Lasso regression
### Ridge regression
liner regression\\( \theta\\)Gaussian distributioncost function
$$J( \theta) = \frac{1}{2} \sum^{m}_{i=1} (y^{(i)}- \theta^T x^{(i)})+ \lambda \sum^{d}_{j=1} ( \theta^{(i)})^2$$
Ridge regressionshrinkage
## geometry of error surfaces
priori distributioncost function
$$J( \theta) = \frac{1}{2} \sum^{m}_{i=1} (y^{(i)}- \theta^T x^{(i)})^2$$

![](http://otmy7guvn.bkt.clouddn.com/blog/4/4-2.png) 
objective function\\( \theta\\)\\(w\\)\\(l\\)losscost functionpriori distributionoptimization target.

priori distributionoptimizationconvex optimization
$$ \theta=argmin \frac{1}{2} \sum^{m}_{i=1} (y^{(i)}- \theta^T x^{(i)})^2$$
$$ s.t. \sum^{d}_{j=1}| \theta^{(i)}|^p \geq \beta$$
\\( \beta\\)ridgelasso

![](http://otmy7guvn.bkt.clouddn.com/blog/4/4-3.png) 
optimizationregularization itemcost functionobjective functionregularization item.

gradient descentoptimzationregularizationcost functiongradientgradient descentregularization
